sense.gloss: to ask, to enquire, to query
to hear about, to hear of, to learn of
to follow (advice, order, etc.), to obey, to listen to, to comply with
to hear (e.g. a plea), to grant (a request), to accept (e.g. an argument), to give consideration to
to smell (esp. incense), to sample (a fragrance)
being able to hear something (clearly), clearness of a sound, reception (e.g. of a radio station)
to be heard, to be audible, to reach one's ears
to be well known, to be famous
to accept (someone's words), to agree, to understand
hearing what others say, gathering information, opinions, etc., public hearing

sdata.j: ↑今日↑↓きょう↓はもう↑聞↑↓き↓かないよ。
sdata.e: I won't ask you anything else today.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓が↑次↑↓つぎ↓に↑分↑↓わ↓かることは↑君↑↓きみ↓が↑新聞↑↓しんぶん↓に↑載↑↓の↓るってことだ。
sdata.e: Next thing you know, you'll be in the papers.

sdata.j: 「どうかしたの？」と↑小↑↓ちい↓さな↑白↑↓しろ↓いウサギが↑聞↑↓き↓きました。
sdata.e: What's the matter? asked the little white rabbit.

sdata.j: ↑私↑↓わたし↓の↑言↑↓い↓う↑事↑↓こと↓を↑聞↑↓き↓くべきだったのに。
sdata.e: You should have listened to me.

sdata.j: ↑彼↑↓かれ↓がそれを↑聞↑↓き↓いたら↑喜↑↓よろこ↓ぶよ。
sdata.e: He would be glad to hear that.

sdata.j: ↑考↑↓かんが↓えていることを↑聞↑↓き↓くな。やることを↑聞↑↓き↓け。
sdata.e: Don't ask what they think. Ask what they do.

sdata.j: これにつきまして、お↑考↑↓かんが↓えをお↑聞↑↓き↓かせ↑願↑↓ねが↓えればと↑存↑↓ぞん↓じます。
sdata.e: I look forward to hearing your thoughts on this matter.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓の↑愚痴↑↓ぐち↓はもう↑聞↑↓き↓きたくないよ。
sdata.e: I don't want to hear any more of your complaining.

words.gloss: being able to hear something (clearly), clearness of a sound, reception (e.g. of a radio station)
